name: Haute Pickup Artist
description:
This is a meme game! Designed to have the **best** controls.

Use your keyboard to control the garbage truck and remove pompous trash from a simulated neighborhood!

F to go forward

B to go backwards

R for Reverse+Right

L to go Left+Lift the pick

Enjoy!

Modifiers: no scrubs, trash palette

Salvaged the dumpster fire animation from a blender fluid simulation done earlier in the year. All other assets were generated during the jam, and after all the other projects.
